name: Music Disc - 13
description: A music disc that plays a calm, ambient track with eerie undertones. Found in dungeon and woodland mansion chests.
tips: Creepers drop music discs when killed by a skeleton's arrow. Dungeons and woodland mansions also contain disc chests.

name: Music Disc - Cat
description: A cheerful, upbeat music disc. Commonly found in dungeon chests or dropped by creepers.
tips: One of the most common discs. Check dungeons or set up a skeleton-creeper farm.

name: Music Disc - Blocks
description: An upbeat electronic-style music disc. Dropped by creepers killed by skeletons.
tips: Use a skeleton to kill a creeper for a chance to obtain this disc.

name: Music Disc - Chirp
description: A retro-style music disc with a nostalgic feel. Dropped by creepers killed by skeletons.
tips: Farm creepers with skeletons or find in dungeon chests.

name: Music Disc - Far
description: A calm, peaceful music disc with nature-inspired sounds. Dropped by creepers killed by skeletons.
tips: Obtain through creeper farming or dungeon exploration.

name: Music Disc - Mall
description: A mellow, relaxing music disc. Dropped by creepers killed by skeletons.
tips: Standard creeper drop disc. Set up a music disc farm for efficiency.

name: Music Disc - Mellohi
description: A slow, melancholic music disc with a haunting melody. Dropped by creepers killed by skeletons.
tips: One of the shorter discs. Obtain through skeleton-creeper interactions.

name: Music Disc - Stal
description: A jazzy music disc featuring piano and bass. Dropped by creepers killed by skeletons.
tips: Classic disc obtainable through standard creeper farming methods.

name: Music Disc - Strad
description: A tropical, uplifting music disc. Dropped by creepers killed by skeletons.
tips: Obtain through creeper drops or dungeon chest loot.

name: Music Disc - Ward
description: A mysterious music disc that starts with a record scratch. Dropped by creepers killed by skeletons.
tips: Standard creeper drop. The beginning features a snippet of a Chopin funeral march.

name: Music Disc - Wait
description: An electronic music disc with chiptune elements. Dropped by creepers killed by skeletons.
tips: Also known as 'where are we now'. Obtain through standard disc farming.

name: Music Disc - 11
description: A broken, eerie music disc with unsettling ambient sounds. Found in dungeon chests.
tips: The most mysterious disc. Found in dungeons or dropped by creepers. Features disturbing ambient sounds.

name: Music Disc - Pigstep
description: A powerful bass-heavy disc by Lena Raine. Exclusively found in bastion remnant chests.
tips: Only found in bastion remnant generic chests with a 5.6% chance. Cannot be obtained from creepers.

name: Music Disc - Otherside
description: A nostalgic, emotional track by Lena Raine. Found in ancient cities and rarely in dungeons.
tips: 8.4% chance in ancient city chests, 3.1% in dungeon chests. One of the rarer discs to find.

name: Music Disc - 5
description: A haunting disc that must be crafted from disc fragments. The fragments are found only in ancient cities.
tips: Collect 9 disc fragments from ancient city chests to craft. Fragments have a 29.8% spawn rate per chest.

name: Music Disc - Relic
description: An ancient-sounding disc discovered through archaeology. Found exclusively in trail ruins.
tips: Use a brush on suspicious gravel in trail ruins. Has a low spawn rate, so brush many blocks.

name: Music Disc - Creator
description: A new disc added in 1.21 featuring an inspiring melody. Found in trial chambers.
tips: Explore trial chambers and defeat the challenges within to find this disc in reward chests.

name: Music Disc - Creator (Music Box)
description: A music box variant of the Creator disc with a delicate, tinkling melody. Found in trial chambers.
tips: A variant of Creator found in trial chamber vaults. Listen for its distinctive music box sound.

name: Music Disc - Precipice
description: An intense, dramatic disc added in 1.21. Found in trial chambers as a rare reward.
tips: Found in ominous trial chamber vaults. Complete ominous trials for the best chance.

name: Painting - Kebab
description: A 1x1 painting depicting a kebab with peppers.
tips: Place paintings repeatedly until you get the desired one, or use commands in creative mode.

name: Painting - Aztec
description: A 1x1 painting showing a pixelated Aztec-style pattern (de_aztec from Counter-Strike).
tips: One of the original paintings. Place and break until it appears.

name: Painting - Alban
description: A 1x1 painting showing a man in Albanian attire next to a house.
tips: Standard small painting. Randomly selected when placed.

name: Painting - Aztec2
description: A 1x1 painting showing another Aztec-style design (de_aztec from Counter-Strike).
tips: Variant of the Aztec painting. Keep placing until obtained.

name: Painting - Bomb
description: A 1x1 painting depicting a bomb (Counter-Strike reference).
tips: Gaming reference painting. Randomly appears when placing 1x1 paintings.

name: Painting - Plant
description: A 1x1 painting showing a potted plant.
tips: Simple decorative painting. One of the common 1x1 variants.

name: Painting - Wasteland
description: A 1x1 painting depicting a rabbit in a barren landscape.
tips: Features a lonely rabbit. Standard painting placement mechanics.

name: Painting - Pool
description: A 2x1 painting showing a swimming pool scene.
tips: Requires a 2-wide space to place. Keep trying until it appears.

name: Painting - Courbet
description: A 2x1 painting showing two hikers.
tips: Named after the artist Gustave Courbet. Place on a 2-wide wall.

name: Painting - Sea
description: A 2x1 painting depicting a seascape.
tips: Ocean-themed painting. Requires horizontal space to appear.

name: Painting - Sunset
description: A 2x1 painting showing a sunset over mountains.
tips: Beautiful landscape painting. Place and replace until obtained.

name: Painting - Creebet
description: A 2x1 painting showing a creeper in a Courbet-style scene.
tips: A humorous take on classic art with a Minecraft creeper.

name: Painting - Wanderer
description: A 1x2 painting inspired by Caspar David Friedrich's 'Wanderer above the Sea of Fog'.
tips: Vertical painting requiring 2-high space. Classic romantic art reference.

name: Painting - Graham
description: A 1x2 painting showing King Graham from King's Quest.
tips: Gaming reference to Sierra's King's Quest series.

name: Painting - Match
description: A 2x2 painting showing a hand holding a match in darkness.
tips: Medium-sized painting. Requires 2x2 wall space.

name: Painting - Bust
description: A 2x2 painting depicting a bust statue.
tips: Classical statue artwork. Standard 2x2 painting placement.

name: Painting - Stage
description: A 2x2 painting showing a stage scene (Space Quest reference).
tips: Gaming reference painting. Place on adequate wall space.

name: Painting - Void
description: A 2x2 painting depicting an angel praying over a void.
tips: Atmospheric dark painting. One of the more mysterious artworks.

name: Painting - Skull and Roses
description: A 2x2 painting showing a skeleton with roses (Grateful Dead reference).
tips: Music reference painting. Also called 'Mortal Coil' in some versions.

name: Painting - Wither
description: A 2x2 painting depicting the wither creation process.
tips: Hints at wither spawning. Shows soul sand and wither skeleton skulls arrangement.

name: Painting - Fighters
description: A 4x2 painting showing two fighters in combat (International Karate reference).
tips: Large horizontal painting. Requires significant wall space.

name: Painting - Pointer
description: A 4x4 painting showing a hand pointing at a pixelated figure.
tips: Large painting. Requires 4x4 clear wall space to place.

name: Painting - Pigscene
description: A 4x4 painting showing a pig being painted on a canvas with RGB values.
tips: One of the largest paintings. Features a meta art-within-art scene.

name: Painting - Burning Skull
description: A 4x4 painting depicting a flaming skull.
tips: Large dramatic painting. Also called 'Skull on Fire'.

name: Painting - Skeleton
description: A 4x3 painting showing a skeleton in a fiery scene.
tips: Large painting requiring specific dimensions to appear.

name: Painting - Donkey Kong
description: A 4x3 painting referencing the classic Donkey Kong arcade game.
tips: Gaming nostalgia painting. Requires 4x3 wall space.

name: Painting - Earth
description: A 2x2 painting showing Earth from space.
tips: Added in newer versions. Shows our planet in pixel art style.

name: Painting - Wind
description: A 2x2 painting depicting wind-blown elements.
tips: Nature-themed painting added in recent updates.

name: Painting - Fire
description: A 2x2 painting showing flames.
tips: Elemental painting. Part of the elements series.

name: Painting - Water
description: A 2x2 painting depicting water.
tips: Elemental painting showing aquatic themes.

name: Banner Pattern - Creeper Charge
description: A banner pattern featuring the creeper face. Crafted using paper and a creeper head.
tips: Obtain a creeper head by having a charged creeper explode near a regular creeper, then craft with paper.

name: Banner Pattern - Skull Charge
description: A banner pattern featuring a skull and crossbones. Crafted using paper and a wither skeleton skull.
tips: Kill wither skeletons in Nether fortresses for skull drops, then craft with paper.

name: Banner Pattern - Flower Charge
description: A banner pattern featuring an oxeye daisy. Crafted using paper and an oxeye daisy.
tips: Find oxeye daisies in plains or flower forest biomes, then craft with paper.

name: Banner Pattern - Thing
description: A banner pattern featuring the Mojang logo. Crafted using paper and an enchanted golden apple.
tips: Enchanted golden apples are found in dungeon, mineshaft, bastion, and ancient city chests. Very rare!

name: Banner Pattern - Globe
description: A banner pattern featuring a globe design. Obtained through trading with master cartographer villagers.
tips: Level up a cartographer villager to master level to unlock this trade.

name: Banner Pattern - Snout
description: A banner pattern featuring a piglin snout. Found in bastion remnant chests.
tips: Search bastion remnant chests. Found in all bastion chest types with varying chances.

name: Banner Pattern - Flow
description: A banner pattern with a flowing design. Found in trial chambers as of 1.21.
tips: Explore trial chambers and complete challenges to find this pattern in vault rewards.

name: Banner Pattern - Guster
description: A banner pattern featuring a gust of wind design. Found in trial chambers as of 1.21.
tips: Found in ominous trial chamber vaults. Complete ominous trials for the best chances.

name: Armor Trim - Coast
description: A coastal-themed armor trim template. Found in shipwreck chests.
tips: Explore ocean biomes for shipwrecks. Check the treasure chests inside.

name: Armor Trim - Dune
description: A desert-themed armor trim template. Found in desert temple chests.
tips: Locate desert temples and carefully navigate the trapped treasure room.

name: Armor Trim - Eye
description: A stronghold-themed armor trim with an eye design. Found in stronghold altar chests.
tips: Use eyes of ender to locate strongholds, then search the altar room chests.

name: Armor Trim - Host
description: An armor trim found through archaeology in trail ruins.
tips: Use a brush on suspicious gravel in trail ruins to potentially uncover this trim.

name: Armor Trim - Raiser
description: An armor trim found through archaeology in trail ruins.
tips: Brush suspicious gravel blocks in trail ruins. Low drop rate, so be patient.

name: Armor Trim - Rib
description: A skeletal-themed armor trim. Found in Nether fortress chests.
tips: Search chest corridors in Nether fortresses. Watch out for blazes and wither skeletons.

name: Armor Trim - Sentry
description: A pillager-themed armor trim. Found in pillager outpost chests.
tips: Locate pillager outposts and search the chest at the top of the tower.

name: Armor Trim - Shaper
description: An armor trim found through archaeology in trail ruins.
tips: Trail ruins contain suspicious gravel with potential trim templates. Brush carefully.

name: Armor Trim - Silence
description: A rare deep dark-themed armor trim. Found exclusively in ancient city chests.
tips: Ancient cities are dangerous due to the warden. Sneak carefully and check all chests. Very rare drop.

name: Armor Trim - Snout
description: A piglin-themed armor trim. Found in bastion remnant chests.
tips: Wear gold armor to avoid piglin aggression while looting bastion remnants.

name: Armor Trim - Spire
description: An End-themed armor trim. Found in end city chests.
tips: Defeat the ender dragon first, then explore end cities via end gateways.

name: Armor Trim - Tide
description: An ocean-themed armor trim. Found in ocean monument elder guardian drops.
tips: Defeat elder guardians in ocean monuments. Bring water breathing potions and good armor.

name: Armor Trim - Vex
description: A woodland-themed armor trim. Found in woodland mansion chests.
tips: Woodland mansions are rare. Get a map from a cartographer or explore dark forest biomes.

name: Armor Trim - Ward
description: A deep dark-themed armor trim. Found in ancient city chests.
tips: Navigate ancient cities carefully to avoid alerting the warden. Check ice box structures.

name: Armor Trim - Wayfinder
description: An armor trim found through archaeology in trail ruins.
tips: Trail ruins spawn in various biomes. Look for suspicious gravel to brush.

name: Armor Trim - Wild
description: A jungle-themed armor trim. Found in jungle temple chests.
tips: Find jungle temples and navigate the trap-filled interior to reach the treasure.

name: Armor Trim - Bolt
description: A lightning-themed armor trim added in 1.21. Found in trial chambers.
tips: Complete trial chamber challenges to earn vault keys and unlock rewards containing this trim.

name: Armor Trim - Flow
description: A flowing design armor trim added in 1.21. Found in trial chambers.
tips: Found in ominous trial chamber vaults. The rarest of the trial chamber trims.

name: Pottery Sherd - Angler
description: A pottery sherd depicting a fishing scene. Found through archaeology.
tips: Brush suspicious sand in warm ocean ruins to find this sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Archer
description: A pottery sherd depicting an archer. Found through archaeology in desert structures.
tips: Search desert temples and desert wells for suspicious sand to brush.

name: Pottery Sherd - Arms Up
description: A pottery sherd showing a figure with arms raised. Found through archaeology.
tips: Desert wells often contain suspicious sand. Brush carefully for sherds.

name: Pottery Sherd - Blade
description: A pottery sherd depicting a sword or blade. Found through archaeology.
tips: Cold ocean ruins contain suspicious gravel with this sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Brewer
description: A pottery sherd showing a brewing stand. Found through archaeology.
tips: Desert structures contain suspicious sand that may yield this sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Burn
description: A pottery sherd depicting flames. Found through archaeology in trail ruins.
tips: Trail ruins have suspicious gravel that can contain this fire-themed sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Danger
description: A pottery sherd showing a creeper face warning. Found through archaeology.
tips: Brush suspicious gravel in trail ruins for a chance at this sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Explorer
description: A pottery sherd depicting an explorer with a map. Found through archaeology.
tips: Cold ocean ruins suspicious gravel may contain this adventure-themed sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Friend
description: A pottery sherd showing two figures together. Found through archaeology.
tips: Trail ruins are a reliable source for various sherds including this one.

name: Pottery Sherd - Heart
description: A pottery sherd depicting a heart. Found through archaeology.
tips: Brush suspicious gravel in trail ruins for this love-themed sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Heartbreak
description: A pottery sherd showing a broken heart. Found through archaeology.
tips: The counterpart to the heart sherd. Found in trail ruins.

name: Pottery Sherd - Howl
description: A pottery sherd depicting a howling wolf. Found through archaeology.
tips: Trail ruins suspicious gravel can yield this wolf-themed sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Miner
description: A pottery sherd showing a miner with a pickaxe. Found through archaeology.
tips: Desert structures are the source for this mining-themed sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Mourner
description: A pottery sherd depicting a mourning figure. Found through archaeology.
tips: Cold ocean ruins suspicious gravel may contain this somber sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Plenty
description: A pottery sherd showing abundance or harvest. Found through archaeology.
tips: Brush suspicious gravel in cold ocean ruins for this sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Prize
description: A pottery sherd depicting a diamond reward. Found through archaeology.
tips: Desert structures suspicious sand can yield this valuable sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Sheaf
description: A pottery sherd showing a bundle of wheat. Found through archaeology.
tips: Trail ruins are the place to find this farming-themed sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Shelter
description: A pottery sherd depicting a shelter or house. Found through archaeology.
tips: Warm ocean ruins suspicious sand may contain this home-themed sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Skull
description: A pottery sherd showing a skull. Found through archaeology.
tips: Desert structures are where you will find this ominous sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Snort
description: A pottery sherd depicting a sniffer. Found through archaeology.
tips: Warm ocean ruins contain suspicious sand with this sniffer-themed sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Flow
description: A pottery sherd with a flowing pattern. Added in 1.21, found in trial chambers.
tips: Brush suspicious gravel in trial chambers to find this 1.21 sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Guster
description: A pottery sherd depicting a gust or wind pattern. Added in 1.21, found in trial chambers.
tips: Trial chambers contain suspicious gravel with this wind-themed sherd.

name: Pottery Sherd - Scrape
description: A pottery sherd with a scraped design. Added in 1.21, found in trial chambers.
tips: Found by brushing suspicious gravel in trial chambers.
